attributes.action: stop high extortionate interest rates for loan companys and car purchase
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are getting ripped of by the funding corporation for car finance and other loans, we are on a low wage and if we argue with any company we get blacklisted and have to go to one of these rip off companys, usually the interestrate is 49% apr ie,£3000 loan pay back £11000 over 4 years, heavy handed salespeople to make sure you sign, then you struggle and try to pay and end up in debt and frightened to open the door or answer the phone,constant text messages,evening and day time calls from them,
